fields.fieldTitle: Who is your Target Niche member? (singular)

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: speaker, small business owner, home owner, investor, copywriter, advertiser

fields.fieldTitle: What is the #1 Good Thing they want MORE of?

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: speaking gigs, sales, growth in your small business, financial freedom, high converting ads

fields.fieldTitle: What is the #2 Good Thing they also want MORE of?

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: back of room sales, leads, free time in your small business, guaranteed return on your investments, clicks to your website

fields.fieldTitle: #1 Negative thing they want to avoid?

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: not having any speaking gigs, negative cashflow, refunds, shrinking profit margins, huge debt, crappy ads

fields.fieldTitle: #2 Negative thing they want to avoid?

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: terrible back of the room sales rate, declining sales, low customer traffic, time vampire clients, soul crushing monthly bills, outrageously expensive leads
